name: catachresis
text: I will play Philippe's song at my wedding

name: combustache
text:
Goddamn, every time I have a reaction to a comic, I scroll down and the first comment is exactly what I'm thinking.
Now it's just a race for who can get married first...

name: jhunter
text:
It is a race in which there are only losers.

Unless you find true love and live in happiness for the rest of your days. You know? Then it's a victory.

name: gazdatronik
text:
This would be a good song for dean martin. for this strip, phillipe is using his voice.

DEAN: Here, phillipe, put this bowtie on and have a voice like mine.

name: anticitizen
text:
"What's this?"
"Scotch. Don't sniff it, just drink it you little Super-Sized-Homo-Jackass."

name: ajesteronly
text: This was the heading on my wedding invitation.

name: mystkmanat
text: What was?

name: geysershitdick
text:
She really is touched at the end, but she still treats him like crap. I think we've all had an Ultra Peanut in our lives at some point.

I would like to hear a full version of this song one day, even if it's just lyrics. Onstad? Are you out there, buddy?

name: sredni
text: Yeah, me too.

name: juancarlos
text: If I had a dollar for every time a girl called me a Super-Sized-Homo-Jackass. I'd have 8 dollars.

name: ocarinak
text:
I want to give you a chubby for that, but you have exactly eight.
Who am I to ruin this wonder.

name: badganjil
text:
A-HA!

Now YOU are the one with 8 chubbies!

name: semiquaver
text: Not any more.  Now we have to get started on this one.  Come on, people, don't fuck it up this time.

name: nilehus
text:
Alright... aaaand we're good.

Even if it may not be on the original comment, it still carries on in spirit.

name: semiquaver
text: Psst.  Get started on wigglestick's comment, just in case.

name: farqussus
text: fixed

name: wigglestick
text: No, it is now YOU.

name: straw
text: And now it is you, my good chum!

name: i_love_kate
text: And now it's you, as someone keeps putting all the rest of them one over. Jeez!

name: donnatron
text:
Goodness. I thought I would NEVER get to add the 8th chubby to one of these comments.

Buuuuut I did. I was really sweating over that one, too!

name: quazifuji
text: After all of the others reached 10, I just gave this one the 8th chubby.  Hopefully, things can now be at peace.

name: shoinan
text: I naturally felt compelled to ruin everything, but to compensate I gave you a chubby too quazifuji

name: nice-on-water
text: It is done.

name: puguglypress
text: two more needed for nice-on-water...

name: nice-on-water
text: BRING EM ON

name: deusoma
text: Yes!

name: saulbellow
text: Bwah ha ha

name: fuzzyshoo
text: Now it has 88 chubbies. Awesome.

name: ford
text: Man, too bad it's not seven dollars, that'd open up the "Are you seven dollars? Yes you are !" branch of derivative jokes.

name: akadriver
text: I don't think she's actually treating him badly.  She just learned English from watching South Park or something.

name: william
text: " I like to marry things I find, I'm glad that I found you! " sounds an awful lot like a proposal.

name: falseprophet
text: Philippe is a cold playa like that.

name: asobi
text: The dude is ravenous for love.

name: morganization
text: chris's romantic side comes out in this one

name: whuppins
text: The last panel contains probably my favorite Philippe expression ever.

name: phy
text: There is something of the Golden Age leading man in it.

name: asobi
text: Sung to the tune of Al Bowlly's rendition of "Guilty" (as featured in Amelie)

name: brzbee
text: Aw, damn... now that i'm looking  it, he totally has a Bruce Campbell thing going on...

name: tombsgrave
text: D'awwwwwwww.  Phillipe is cute.

name: shmuckeles
text: A comment left by shmuckeles was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by rowboat, Jesus, zaer, usversusthem, RoboticSpencer)

name: bjorntd
text: No.

name: mthrfckr
text: aaah, so all the questions of whether or not phillippe is retarded are answered here.

name: songbirdspectre
text: i think i am ultra-peanut. good thing i have her t-shirt.

name: jdhenry105
text: Here comes a special girl.

name: aliiis
text:
i have her face

also, it is a continual source of disappointment in my life that whenever I call somebody a retard, they do not respond by laughing and proposing to me through the medium of song. why?

name: falseprophet
text:
Here lies aliiis

The world was just too complex for her.

name: honesttom
text:
I imagine Philippe's voice in the last panel as having a Sinatra quality.

I give this a 5 purely for teaching me the phrase "Super-size homo jackass".

name: godfatherofsouls
text: Yes, this is what those eyebrows mean to me as well.

name: quarantine
text: I love Phillipe's song

name: hypoluxa
text: I think I just found a new endearing term for my friends.

name: foxtrotamend
text: This strip has officially made Philippe my favorite Achewood character.  That song just did it.

name: gethen
text: Ultra Peanut is a stone-cold bitch.

name: yingkaixing
text: I think she's hot.

name: budenhagen
text: Pedophile AND a furry? Terrible, terrible man.

name: kelsotimebomb
text: And that's terrible.

name: heccibiggs
text: This is extra awful with your icon.

name: heccibiggs
text: I mean avatar, shit, SHIT

name: baryonyx
text: In woman matters, I admit to having judgment as poor as Phileppe.

name: farqussus
text: everyone's bad at cricket when they're six. It doesn't make them redundant.

name: semiquaver
text: Redundant?

name: farqussus
text: Prince Charles

name: semiquaver
text:
Touche.

Rhyming with "Douche," for no reason but that i am suspicious of accent marks and Assetbar playing together.

name: crumpetsandtea
text: that song is almost exactly how my current boyfriend won me over

name: crumpetsandtea
text: update: now EXboyfriend.

name: aliiis
text: I like to think that making this post was pretty much the first thing you did after the break up

name: crumpetsandtea
text: haha 'bout three months too late

name: fineoakstructure
text:
so, by "almost exactly," were you saying that he changed something in the lyrics? I'm assuming he didn't propose marriage to you as a first date, so did he sing something like:

I like to nail things I find
I'm glad that I found you !

?

name: crumpetsandtea
text:
well yea, but it was also a rap.

and its true. he does like to nail things he finds...
especially dirty fucking whores in that cheap ass purple dress with those damn heals FUCK I HATE YOU BRITNEY
sorry about that. sorry everyone

name: heccibiggs
text:
I can't help but hear the song in any tune other than that of "These boots are made for walking/and that's just what they'll do..."

But, with a Sinatra-esque voice and a more swing-based accompaniment. YOU KNOW IT WORKS.

name: mr_lostman28
text: These Boots Are Made For Walking: originally performed by Nancy Sinatra.

name: synnah
text: This strip is pretty much the main reason to love Philippe. If I had children of my own, they would be a constant source of disappointment for me, simply by not being Philippe.

name: charchar
text: Who taught Ultra Peanut to swear in English?  When I took French I had to look up all my own cusses.

name: justa
text: When I took Spanish my instructor covered cusses on the second day of class. I assume it was so the frat boys in the audience wouldn't harass her concerning cusses for the rest of the semester.

name: charchar
text: My best friend is Puerto Rican.  That's where I got my Spanish cusses.

name: lazarusloafer
text:
French cusses are AWESOME.
Almost as awesome as bilingual Quebec cusses, like "Tabarfuck".

name: mattylite
text: Are the flipper movements in panel 5 Phillipe's way of doing those quotation marks you can do with your fingers?  On account of he has no fingers?  Since he's an otter?  A stuffed animal otter?

name: justa
text: Ah, young love.

name: johnnyrocker
text: What's with her ears? Why are they so different?

name: odei
text: Probably because they're made of hair.

name: donnatron
text: I have a major Soft spot for Ultra Peanut's use of capitalization. Anyone who can capitalize in their Everyday speech is a hero to me.

name: fineoakstructure
text: Is Nice Pete a Hero to you, as well?

name: quinlaenar
text: I was going to ask if Margo Roth Spiegleman was a hero.

name: ryanfuss
text: Phillipe cocks his eyebrows as if asking her to dance along with him..

name: mercuri0us
text: Phillipe is a straight playa. Guys, we could all learn a thing or two from the man.

name: sonicscream2
text: What kind of name is ultra peanut?

name: retinarow
text: Japanese.

name: i_love_kate
text:
Yeah, all those Asian countries are pretty much the same. Japan, China... What's the difference when it comes down to it, eh? What's the difference?

Fucker.

name: mikeronomicon
text: Seriously, Ultra Peanut is the proverbial shit.

name: aggro-lite
text: ok-- "super-size homo jackass" has my co-workers looking funny at the chuckling idiot at his desk

name: robocop
text: inverting an eyebrow turns on the mega charm.

name: epicurus
text: Philippe, unbeknownst to him, delivers one of the five greatest romantic saves in history.
